{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = GuruPlug |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/c-4-guruplugs.aspx |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = GlobalScale_GuruPlug_Display |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GlobalScale |model = GuruPlug |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Display (US Edition) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = plug computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88AP168;ARMADA 100, MMP; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM v5 |cpu1_type_rev = (PJ1 core) |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 400 / 800 / 1000 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Atmel;AT45DB041B; |flash1size = 0.5 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SD Card |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Kingston;; |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Elpida;E1108AFBG-1E-F; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E3015; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:AD:4E,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.01-rc1;Marvell version:1.1.1.1 PXAxxx; |stockos = Linux;2.6.29;Debian 5;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.2 |pwr_conn = C7
|serial = yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = yes,, MicroSD interface
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL-2303HX;;1;,,, HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA9981B;;1;,,, HDTV Clock Synthesizer;MicroClock;MK2716S;;1;,,, CEC/I2C-bus Translator;NXP;TDA9950;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9199;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = nosoup4u |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- 003-GD0001 --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Arch Linux (Arm),
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2011 |estprice = 199 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88AP168 @ 800MHz *Video: WMMX2 *Memory: 512MB *Storage: 8GB Internal Kingston mirosSD, 2x External MicroSD Slot *Network 1x Fast Ethernet *USB: 4x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG *Power Source: C7 AC adapter, 100-240V, 50-60Hz
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GuruPlug ''GuruPlug'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/guruplug-display ''Guruplug Display'' on '''archlinux|ARM''']
